abstract: nike inc shares sold by janney montgomery scott llc .
article: janney montgomery scott llc trimmed its holdings in shares of nike inc by 3.3 % during the third quarter , according to its most recent form 13f filing with the sec . the firm owned 212,941 shares of the footwear maker 's stock after selling 7,277 shares during the period . janney montgomery scott llc 's holdings in nike were worth $ 11,041,000 at the end of the most recent reporting period . other institutional investors and hedge funds have also modified their holdings of the company . vontobel asset management inc. . grew its holdings in nike by 13.7 % during the second quarter .

vontobel asset management inc. . now owns 5,028,879 shares of the footwear maker 's stock worth $ 303,885,000 after acquiring an additional 604,970 shares during the period . northwest investment counselors llc increased its stake in nike by 1.2 % in the 2nd quarter . northwest investment counselors llc now owns 27,648 shares of the footwear maker 's stock worth $ 1,631,000 after purchasing an additional 317 shares in the last quarter . stokes & hubbell capital management llc purchased a new position in nike in the 2nd quarter worth about $ 1,486,000 . bank of the west increased its stake in nike by 1.9 % in the 2nd quarter .

bank of the west now owns 42,457 shares of the footwear maker 's stock worth $ 2,505,000 after purchasing an additional 788 shares in the last quarter . finally , acropolis investment management llc purchased a new position in nike in the 2nd quarter worth about $ 1,092,000 . 62.86 % of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors . in related news , chairman mark g. parker sold 135,000 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction that occurred on wednesday , november 1st . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 55.03 , for a total value of $ 7,429,050.00 .

following the completion of the sale , the chairman now directly owns 1,637,736 shares in the company , valued at approximately $ 90,124,612.08 . the transaction was disclosed in a filing with the sec , which can be accessed through the sec website . also , evp john f. slusher sold 100,000 shares of the business 's stock in a transaction that occurred on tuesday , january 2nd . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 63.09 , for a total value of $ 6,309,000.00 . following the completion of the sale , the executive vice president now owns 268,169 shares of the company 's stock , valued at $ 16,918,782.21 .

the disclosure for this sale can be found here . over the last 90 days , insiders sold 967,896 shares of company stock valued at $ 60,257,267 . corporate insiders own 3.90 % of the company 's stock . shares of nike inc opened at $ 66.39 on tuesday . the stock has a market capitalization of $ 109,346.56 , a pe ratio of 28.74 , a peg ratio of 3.05 and a beta of 0.64 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.30 , a quick ratio of 1.67 and a current ratio of 2.46 . nike inc has a 1-year low of $ 50.35 and a 1-year high of $ 67.24 .

nike last announced its quarterly earnings results on thursday , december 21st . the footwear maker reported $ 0.46 earnings per share for the quarter , beating the thomson reuters ' consensus estimate of $ 0.40 by $ 0.06 . nike had a return on equity of 31.64 % and a net margin of 11.13 % . the business had revenue of $ 8.55 billion during the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 8.39 billion . during the same period in the previous year , the company earned $ 0.50 eps . the firm 's revenue was up 4.6 % on a year-over-year basis .

sell-side analysts anticipate that nike inc will post 2.25 earnings per share for the current year . the business also recently announced a quarterly dividend , which was paid on tuesday , january 2nd . investors of record on monday , december 4th were issued a $ 0.20 dividend . this is a positive change from nike 's previous quarterly dividend of $ 0.18 . this represents a $ 0.80 annualized dividend and a yield of 1.21 % . the ex-dividend date of this dividend was friday , december 1st . nike 's payout ratio is 34.63 % . a number of equities analysts recently weighed in on nke shares .

nomura dropped their price target on nike from $ 62.00 to $ 59.00 and set a `` buy '' rating on the stock in a research note on wednesday , september 27th . citigroup reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 65.00 price target on shares of nike in a research note on wednesday , september 27th . instinet reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 62.00 price target on shares of nike in a research note on wednesday , september 27th . buckingham research reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 64.00 price target on shares of nike in a research note on thursday , september 28th .

finally , stifel nicolaus reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 66.00 price target on shares of nike in a research note on saturday , september 30th . two investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , nineteen have given a hold rating and twenty-one have given a buy rating to the stock . nike presently has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus price target of $ 64.94 . trademark violation warning : `` nike inc shares sold by janney montgomery scott llc '' was first published by watch list news and is the property of of watch list news .
